headline: Evergy (EVRG) – One of the Best Utility Stocks to Buy for Dividends
summary: Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) is included among the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy for Dividends. Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) delivers electricity to approximately 1.8 million residential and commercial customers to homes and businesses in Kansas and Missouri. Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) received a boost earlier this month when Barclays raised the stock’s price target from $73 to […]
